mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as sa_id, sa.*, sav.id as sav_id, sav.*, if(skv.sku_id,"1","0") AS isChecked FROM spu_sale_attr sa INNER JOIN spu_sale_attr_value sav ON sa.spu_id = sav.spu_id AND sa.base_sale_attr_id = sav.base_sale_attr_id AND sa.spu_id = #{spuId} LEFT JOIN sku_sale_attr_value skv ON sav.id = skv.sale_attr_value_id AND sa.spu_id = skv.spu_id AND skv.sku_id = #{skuId} ORDER BY sa.base_sale_attr_id , sav.id
